comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: It's "Schliemann" I believe.  Probably Agamemnon Schliemann, son of Heinrich Schliemann, the discoverer of the site of the historic city of Troy.

comment.author: 92708344@N00
comment._content: I have "photo-shopped" this photo and the "restored" version looks fantastic! It's posted on my page if anybody would like to see it. www.flickr.com/photos/92708344@N00/4858120077/in/set-7215...

comment.author: 8348059@N02
comment._content: Agamemnon Schliemann, son of archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann. He was a Greek citizen and appointed Greek Minister to the United States in 1914. New York Times, January 8, 1914, p. 3. His term did not last long as he was recalled in September 1914.
